Classes in com.schneide.quantity.unit used by com.schneide.quantity
Unit
          The class Unit combines an AtomarUnit with the scale and the exponent.
 

Classes in com.schneide.quantity.unit used by com.schneide.quantity.unit
AtomarSignature
          The Signatur is the characteristic which desides, which Units can be converted to each other.
AtomarUnit
          The AtomarUnit is the part of the Unit, which knows all facts about the unit like name of the unit and its AtomarSignature
To get to know more about the use of units see Unit.
Unit
          The class Unit combines an AtomarUnit with the scale and the exponent.
